product_name: ASUS ROG Strix B560-E Gaming Motherboard
slots: 3 x PCIe x16, 3 x PCIe x1
description: The ASUS ROG Strix B560-E is a high-end gaming motherboard for Intel processors. It supports up to 128GB of DDR4 memory and offers fast storage options with M.2 and SATA. Equipped with USB 3.2 Gen 2 and USB-C ports, it ensures high-speed connectivity. It features WiFi 6 and 2.5G LAN for seamless online gaming.

slots: 2 x PCIe x16, 4 x PCIe x1
description: The ASUS Prime Z590-P is a versatile motherboard for Intel processors. It supports up to 128GB of DDR4 memory and offers quick storage access with M.2 and SATA options. It features USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports for fast data transfer. Equipped with 1G LAN, it provides reliable wired networking.

product_name: ASUS TUF Gaming B450-PLUS II Motherboard
slots: 1 x PCIe x16, 2 x PCIe x1
description: The ASUS TUF Gaming B450-PLUS II is a reliable motherboard for AMD processors. It supports up to 128GB of DDR4 memory and offers both M.2 and SATA storage options. It features USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports for decent data speeds. Equipped with 1G LAN, it ensures stable wired connections for gaming.
